Class InputFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • android.support.v4.app.DialogFragment

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PasswordFragment

    public class InputFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.DialogFragment
    popup that asks the user for a text input.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static interface  InputFragment.Listener
      Use this interface to handle okay and cancel events from this popup.

      • InputFragment

        public InputFragment(java.lang.String message,
             java.lang.String prompt,
             InputFragment.Listener l)
        Create a new alert that has an input box, an okay, and cancel button
        Parameters:
        message - the message to display above the input
        prompt - the message to display in the blank input
        l - the listener that handles the okay and cancel events
